title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the difference quotient

1 point is earned for the answer

g'(3)−g'(1) 3−1 = e   f(3) f'(3)−e   f(1) f'(1) 2 =2 e 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@57E0@
descriptions:
